mapper.select: select w.id,w.user_id as userId, w.post_time as postTime,w.content,w.pic1,w.pic2,w.pic3, w.pic4,w.pic5,w.pic6,w.pic7,w.pic8,w.pic9,w.original,w.repost_id as repostId, u.username, u.face from t_weibo w left join t_user u on u.id = w.user_id order by post_time desc limit #{offset},#{count}
